|ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = 34:08:04 |oui = 34:08:04 |bootwait = |stockbootloader = U-Boot;1.0.1.9; |stockos = Linux;2.6.21;; |exp_if_types = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, (57600 8N1) |jtag = yes |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = bgn |defaulip = 192.168.0.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = |defaultssid = |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |manuf = Senao |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = DD-WRT, OpenWrt (Was) |availability = Discontinued |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 04/07/2011 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = Taiwan |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "7016A046300C Rev:1.00" is silkscreened on the board in the above photos on the DD-WRT forums. The OEM seems to be Senao. A C2PC made 11/18/2011 removes the RF shielding, changes the used power adapter, changes the RAM configuration from 2x 16 to 1x 32, and apparently changes the model (to what?). {{seealso|D-Link DIR-615 series}} ==Links of Interest== [http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=145240 D-Link DIR-615 with H1 - DD-WRT forums] (high res internal shots)
[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?p=617896 DIR-615/H1 - DD-WRT Forums] :[http://chomikuj.pl/mlodybd/dir615 Low quality pictures] [https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=32054 DLink DIR-615 rev. H1 (Ralink RT3352): OpenWRT support? - OpenWrt Forums]
[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/d-link/dir-615 DIR-615 on the OpenWrt wiki] ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing dd-wrt=== {{DDWRT |techdata = |wikipage = ? |forumpage = ? |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = |subtarget = |arch = |support_started_version = dir-615h build 19327 20120606 |current_supported_version = ? |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|wassupported}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/d-link/d-link_dir-615_h1 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/d-link/dir-615 |forumpage = https://forum.openwrt.org/t/report-devices-here-with-18-06-0-provided-image-too-big-to-save-overlay/18161/72?u=tmomas |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ramips |subtarget = rt305x |arch = mipsel_24kc |support_started_version = 12.09 |current_supported_version = 18.06.0 |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = Image build disabled in master with commit d7d46da938e3
Image too big: 18.06.0 }} Please insert instructions here ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===JTAG=== ====JTAG Pinouts==== * To make JTAG work on this board, contacts of R21 should be connected together. ===Serial=== {{/Serial info}} ==Pictures==
